column2: [{u'ToPort': u'22', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': {u'Ref': u'AccessLocation'}, u'FromPort': u'22'}]
The name of the created Kinesis Stream

{u'Fn::Base64': {u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#!/bin/bash -ex', u'
', u'yum update -y
', u'yum -y install python-devel postgresql-devel gcc aws-cli
', u'easy_install pip
', u'pip install psycopg2 configparser
', u'cat <<EOF > /home/ec2-user/defaults.cfg
', u'[db]
', u'dbUser=', {u'Ref': u'DBUsername'}, u'
', u'dbPassword=', {u'Ref': u'DBPassword'}, u'
', u'dbName=', {u'Ref': u'DBName'}, u'
', u'dbHost=', {u'Ref': u'RedshiftCluster2Endpoint'}, u'
', u'[kenisis]
', u'steamName=', {u'Ref': u'KinesisStream'}, u'
', u'[dynamodb2]
', u'tableName =', {u'Ref': u'DynamoDBTable'}, u'
', u'[iam]
', u'roleName=', {u'Ref': u'IAMRole'}, u'
', u'EOF
', u'chown ec2-user /home/ec2-user/defaults.cfg
', u'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/awslabs/aws-big-data-blog/master/aws-blog-multi-az-multi-region-redshift/loader.py -P /home/ec2-user
', u'chown ec2-user /home/ec2-user/loader.py
', u'echo "su ec2-user -c 'python /home/ec2-user/loader.py'" >> /etc/rc.local
', u"su ec2-user -c 'python /home/ec2-user/loader.py'"]]}}
